title: Shawl
description: Shawl, hand-loom woven in one piece with the border attached. Design of a \'moon\' and four quarters in shades of yellow, red, green, and blue. The field surrounding central \'moon\' medallion is filled with diagonal rows of flowered cones on a black ground. Lining of scarlet wool. Type of Indian Square shawl is called a \'chandar\'. #6 of exhibition.
